mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (name, class_id, email, password, profile_picture) VALUES (#{name}, #{class_id}, #{email}, #{password}, #{profile_picture})
mapper.update: update user set id=#{id}, password=#{password} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,password from user where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
select user_id, name, email, password, profile_picture, class_id from User order by id desc
